entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Public LSP Handler API that provides Roslyn context #67363
  • Question: CodeFixProvider for diagnostics reported by IIncrementalGenerator #67354

Closed

  • Can a source generator reference itself as an analyzer? #67357
  • Diagnostic reported on property symbol name shouldn't be classified as a non-local diagnostic #67310
  • UseAutoProperty analyzer needs to be rewritten as a SymbolStart/End analyzer #67350
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "module initializers" feature #40500
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch and resolve conflicts around primary constructors #67362
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2138129 #67361
  • Improve props in readonly struct #67360
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update AbstractEditorFactory to implement IVsEditorFactoryChooser #67358
    Area-IDE
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67355
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update 'use auto property' to be a symbol-start/end analyzer instead of a semantic-model analyzer. #67353
    Next
  • Move to new binary logger NuGet #67356
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add tests for local/non-local diagnostic classification for accessor block #67312
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `enum` snippet #67184
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Rename codefix predefined name #67345
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix CSharpMakeStructMemberReadOnlyDiagnosticAnalyzer to report local diagnostic #67352
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Improve error recovery while parsing switch expressions. #67340
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Experimenting with compiler logs #67349
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Simplify creation of unbound generic types #67343
    Area-Compilers
  • Support generating records in syntax generator #67337
    Area-IDE
  • Code changes to allow 'using static unsafe' #67344
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2137261 #67346
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #66050
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
